title: POOL PARTY REWARDS!?

embed.description: Welcome to Team Up Week! League's better with a party, so from June 15-21, team up with friends and earn points by winning games in five-player premades or sending gifts to friends both new and old. These points pool together to unlock levels of rewards for the whole community to enjoy.

body:
In the pool party rewards it says we have unlocked a pool party icon and a mystery champion but i haven't gotten either of these is this the same for everyone and if not does anyone know why. 

PS:i have connected through facebook via lol and also have recieved atleast one point

replies.body: Everything should be granted by 6/27. The only exception is the Mystery Champion, which will roll out by 7/1.
No one has gotten it yet.
you'll probably get them at the end of the event.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fWgchQbL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-21T01:24:02.141+0000)
>
> you'll probably get them at the end of the event.

what is it anyway and are u the only one that has received it?
